channel.description: 14 WAN Architecture 1.0 Network Fundamentals 1.2 Describe the characteristics of network topology architecture 1.2.d WAN 5.0 Security Fundamentals 5.5 Describe remote access and site-to-site VPNs Metro Ethernet Customers connect to a Metro Ethernet service with either routers or Layer 3 switches. Metro Ethernet Physical Design and Topology A device physically near to customer sites is called a point of presence (PoP). The physical link between the customer and the SP is called an access link.
